lead_paragraph: The T.S.A. says travelers can opt out of “advanced imaging technology” scans. But such fliers are subject to a physical pat-down, and sometimes outbursts.
snippet: The T.S.A. says travelers can opt out of “advanced imaging technology” scans. But such fliers are subject to a physical pat-down, and sometimes outbursts.

headline.main: Opt Out of a Body Scan? Then Brace Yourself
headline.seo: Skipping the Body Scanner and Taking Brusque Treatment
headline.print_headline: Opt Out of a Body Scan? Then Brace Yourself
